description: Submit file and receive results to PAN WildFire
name: wildfire_results

alert_num.description: The Alert Number of the IR-Flow alert to run this enrichment on, and to pull file attachment from for submission

filename.description: Name of the attachment in IR-Flow, if submitting from IR-Flow

local_file_path.description: The local file path for the file to submit to PAN WildFire

remote_file_url.description: The remote file path for the file to submit to PAN WildFire

website_link.description: The link for a website to be submitted to PAN WildFire
